newsitem.title: USA: Whitehall sets two-for-one stock split.
newsitem.headline: Whitehall sets two-for-one stock split.

text.p: Whitehall Corp said Thursday its board of directors had declared a two-for-one stock split of its common stock in the form of a 100-percent stock dividend.
The company said the split was pending approval of its shareholders of an increase in the number of shares from 5.0 million to 20 million at a February 17 meeting.
It said it would do the split on March 25.
In November, Whitehall reported it had 2.8 million shares at the end of its third quarter against 2.8 million a year ago.
